keyPolicies.policyDescription: We will stop Brexit and keep Britain united and in the European Union.

mentions.candidate: Prospective Liberal Democrat MP, Sonul Badiani
mentions.otherPartyLeaderCandidate: Jeremy Corbyn’s Labour Party, Boris Johnson
mentions.tacticalSituation: In this area 71% of us voted to Remain in the EU. In May 2019, it is estimated that the Liberal Democrats won the election in Ealing Central and Acton with 36% of the vote, leaving Labour behind with 20% and the Tories with 8%. It’s time we were represented by a Remain MP who is not only an ardent Remainer, but also belongs to a party whose leadership and members are united.

issues.brexitEurope: Jeremy Corbyn’s Labour Party want to deliver their own version of Brexit. Boris Johnson wants to deliver Nigel Farage’s version of Brexit. We will stop Brexit and keep Britain united and in the European Union. Prospective Liberal Democrat MP, Sonul Badiani says “In this area 71% of us voted to Remain in the EU. I was devastated by the results of the Referendum as Brexit runs against all our liberal values.
